attributes.name: nypr-a-ad-label
attributes.description: Advertising label

attributes.name: nypr-a-button
attributes.description:
Base button. Use this component to compose more specific buttons and components.

If a `@url` is passed, an `a` tag is rendered with `target="_blank" rel="noopener"`

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprAButton>
  Click Me
</NyprAButton>
```

accessors.name: tierClass
accessors.description: Computes the class applied based on the value of `tier`

arguments.name: blank
arguments.description: Make this a plain, unstyled button. Useful for wrapping icons

arguments.name: onclick
arguments.description: Specify a click handler

arguments.name: role
arguments.description: Specify the `role` attribute. Default is 'button'.

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Text for element contents

arguments.name: tier
arguments.description: Which tier in the visual heirarchy this button should be.

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: Specify the `type` attribute for the button. Default is "button".

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: External URL

arguments.name: route
arguments.description:
Route arguments for `link-to` component.

[`<route name>`, `<model or identifier>`]

attributes.name: nypr-a-kicker
attributes.description:
Render a "kicker" or small piece of decorated text.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprAKicker>
  News
</NyprAKicker>
```

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Text contents.

arguments.name: route
arguments.description: Arguments to pass to a link-to component

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: URL for anchor tag

attributes.name: nypr-a-media-object
attributes.description:
The OOCSS Media Object [popularized by Nicole Sullivan](http://www.stubbornella.org/content/2010/06/25/the-media-object-saves-hundreds-of-lines-of-code/)

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprAMediaObject as |mo|>
  <mo.media>
    Media area content, like an image
  </mo.media>

  <mo.object>
    Text content or other component
  </mo.object>
</NyprAMediaObject>
```

arguments.name: valign
arguments.description:
Specify a vertical alignment.
Accepts `'t'`, `'c'`, `'b'` for top, center, and bottom.

attributes.name: nypr-a-picture
attributes.description:
Picture element. Renders `<source>` elements for provided s, m, l, or xl breakpoints and images.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprAPicture @breakXl=1000 @srcXl='https://example.com/xlarge-img.jpg' @breakL=800 @srcL='https://example.com/large-img.jpg' @alt='Descriptive alt text'/>
```

arguments.name: breakXl
arguments.description: Extra Large Breakpoint

arguments.name: srcXl
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding extra large breakpoint

arguments.name: breakL
arguments.description: Large Breakpoint

arguments.name: srcL
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding large breakpoint

arguments.name: breakM
arguments.description: Medium Breakpoint

arguments.name: srcM
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding medium breakpoint

arguments.name: breakS
arguments.description: Small Breakpoint

arguments.name: srcS
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding small breakpoint

arguments.name: lazy
arguments.description: Should this image lazy load or not?

arguments.name: alt
arguments.description: Text for `alt` attribute.

arguments.name: width
arguments.description: Width for image element

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: Height for image element

attributes.name: nypr-a-section-heading
attributes.description:
Section header markup

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprASectionHeading>
  Section Header Goes Here
</NyprASectionHeading>
```

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Text contents.

attributes.name: nypr-a-story-headline
attributes.description:
Headline markup for stories.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprAStoryHeadline>
  Headline goes here
</NyprAStoryHeadline>
```

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Text contents.

attributes.name: nypr-a-svg
attributes.description:
A component that will safely render any svg icon found in the `app/templates/components/nypr-a-svg` tree.

If an svg template can't be found, a warning will be printed.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprASvg @icon='wnyc-logo'/>
```

arguments.name: icon
arguments.description: Filename of the icon to render.

attributes.name: nypr-a-tag
attributes.description:
Show a tag

Usage:
```hbs
  <NyprATag @tag='foo'/>
```

arguments.name: prefix
arguments.description:
Prefix the rendered tag with a value. Defaults to `"#"`.
Set to `''` to blank out.

arguments.name: tag
arguments.description: Tag text to display

arguments.name: url
arguments.description:
Set the URL for this tag.
If it's unset, the root element is a span. If it is set, this is an anchor tag.

arguments.name: icon
arguments.description: Icon trigger

attributes.name: nypr-m-author-block
attributes.description: Display author information

arguments.name: author
arguments.description:
Author object. Keys required:
- name
- title
- image
- bio
- contact: each key is a service where the value is the username

attributes.name: nypr-m-block
attributes.description:
Display story details

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMBlock @orientation={{orientation}} @size={{size}} as |block|>
  <block.media @route={{array 'story' 'slug'}} @srcS='https://picsum.photos/800/450' @alt='alt text' />

  <block.object as |o|>
    <o.eyebrow @text='News'/>

    <o.title @h2 @route={{array 'story' 'slug'}}>
      Story Title
    </o.title>

    <o.body as |body|>
      <body.text>
        Short summary of the story
      </body.text>

      <body.meta @authors={{array (hash name='Jen Chung')}} @commentCount=46 />
    </o.body>
  </block.object>

</NyprMBlock>
```

arguments.name: orientation
arguments.description:
Layout orientation.
One of `'v'` or `'h'` for vertical or horizontal.

arguments.name: size
arguments.description:
Block size.
One of `'l'` or `'s'`

attributes.name: nypr-m-block-list
attributes.description: Layout container for blocks

arguments.name: items
arguments.description: List of blocks to render

arguments.name: heading
arguments.description: Optional heading text

attributes.name: nypr-m-block-meta
attributes.description:
Display author name and comment count

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMBlockMeta @authors={{@authors}} @commentCount={{@commentCount}} @commentRoute={{array 'comments'}}/>
```

arguments.name: authors
arguments.description: Author list

arguments.name: commentCount
arguments.description: Comment count

arguments.name: commentRoute
arguments.description: Array of params passed to `link-to` to construct a url to the comments section

arguments.name: commentURL
arguments.description: If passed in, a plain old anchor will be rendered instead of a `link-to`

attributes.name: nypr-m-box-banner
attributes.description:
A box for rendering arbitrary content into `title` and `body` areas.

Will render a `close` button if a `@close` argument is passed.

arguments.name: close
arguments.description: Function to call when the close button is clicked.

attributes.name: nypr-m-brands-linkroll
attributes.description: Extends `nypr-a-toggle-box` to make a flyout with links to NYPR properties.

arguments.name: navItems
arguments.description: Navigation items objects with `url` and `title` keys.

arguments.name: exclude
arguments.description:
Choose a nav item to exclude. Will coerce to lowercase and compare with
each objects lowercased `title` key.

attributes.name: nypr-m-breadcrumb
attributes.description:
Display a given list of breadcrumbs.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMBreadcrumb @breadcrumbs={{breadcrumbs}} />
```

arguments.name: breadcrumbs
arguments.description:
List of `breadcrumb` objects, with a `label` and `url` key.
If there is no `url` value, a span will be rendered.

attributes.name: nypr-m-byline
attributes.description:
Byline for articles to display authors, orgs, and sponsors

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMByline @authors={{authors}} @sponsor={{sponsor}}/>
```

arguments.name: authors
arguments.description: Array of Author objects with a `name`, `url`, and optional `org` keys

arguments.name: sponsor
arguments.description: Sponsor object with `name`, `url`, and `image` keys

attributes.name: nypr-m-figcaption
attributes.description:
`<figcaption/>` molecule for a `<figure/>` element.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMFigcaption @caption="hello world" @credit="Getty Images" />
```

attributes.name: nypr-m-figure
attributes.description:
A `<figure/>` element with an optional caption.

See [nypr-a-picture](/docs/atoms/nypr-a-picture) and [nypr-m-figcaption](/docs/atoms/nypr-m-figcaption) for additional arguments.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMFigure @caption='hello' @credit='getty' @srcS='https://picsum.photos/800/600' />
```

arguments.name: align-caption
arguments.description:
Specify a horizontal alignment.
Accepts `'l'`, `'c'`, `'r'` for left, center, and right

attributes.name: nypr-m-gallery-lead
attributes.description:
Gallery Lead
Preview galleries with 3 thumbnails and an optional viewAll action

arguments.name: viewAll
arguments.description: Handler for "View All" button

arguments.name: goToSlide
arguments.description: Handler for clicks on the current slide button

attributes.name: nypr-m-inline-search
attributes.description:
Inline search form with optional expandable input

Usage:
```hbs
{{!-- block usage --}}
<NyprMInlineSearch as |search|>
  <search.open/>
  <search.form @search={{action 'search'}}/>
</NyprMInlineSearch>

{{!-- inline usage --}}
<NyprMInlineSearch @search={{action 'search'}} />
```

fields.name: isOpen
fields.description: Controls whether or not the input is exapanded in block contexts

arguments.name: formClass
arguments.description: Class list passed to `nypr-m-inline-search/form` component

arguments.name: search
arguments.description: Perform a search with given query. Passed to nested `nypr-m-inline-search/form` component.

attributes.name: nypr-m-nav-read-more
attributes.description: Render a list of links with a label in a dotted box

arguments.name: items
arguments.description:
List of items to render as links. Each item requires the following keys:
- `label` display text
- `route` array of arguments to pass to link-to component [`routeName', `model or identifier`]

attributes.name: nypr-m-newsletter
attributes.description: Newsletter sign up widget

attributes.name: nypr-m-newsletter-form
attributes.description: Newsletter sign up form

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description:
Email submission handler. Makes a POST call to the provided `endpoint` argument,
sending `body` and any additional `params` passed in.

returns.description: task value for success or error state

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Extracts corresponding message based on success status key

params.name: response
params.description: Payload. Expected to have a `status` key

arguments.name: endpoint
arguments.description: Email opt in endpoint

arguments.name: params
arguments.description: Other endpoint params to include in outgoing payload.

arguments.name: subscribedMessage
arguments.description:
Message to display on successful sign ups.
Defaults to "Thanks for signing up!"

attributes.name: nypr-m-progress-bar
attributes.description:
Progress bar to display how much of `document.body` has been scrolled.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMProgressBar/>
```

methods.name: _measure
methods.description: Measure percentage of current body has been scrolled

arguments.name: navItems
arguments.description: Navigation items objects with `url` and `title` keys.

attributes.name: nypr-m-tags
attributes.description:
Display a list of tags.

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprMTags @tags={{tags}} as |Tag tag|>
  <Tag @url='/tags/{{tag}}' />
</NyprMTags>
```

arguments.name: vertical
arguments.description: Use vertical orientation

arguments.name: label
arguments.description: Label text

arguments.name: tags
arguments.description: List of tag values to render.

arguments.name: prefix
arguments.description:
Prefix the rendered tag with a value. Defaults to `"#"`.
Set to `''` to blank out.

attributes.name: o-text-banner
u-spacing--half

arguments.name: category
arguments.description: Category

arguments.name: url
arguments.description:
URL
Link to an external page
Use this or @route for a link

arguments.name: route
arguments.description:
Route
Array of Routing Parameters
Use this or @url for a link

arguments.name: title
arguments.description: Title

arguments.name: description
arguments.description: Description

attributes.name: nypr-o-article-body
attributes.description:
Article body element Usage: ```hbs

some raw HTML

 ```

methods.name: toTop
methods.description: Scrolls window to top of page or provided selector

methods.name: focusOnTop
methods.description: Focus screenreaders at top of page too

arguments.name: selector
arguments.description: Optional dom selector scroll target

arguments.name: offset
arguments.description: Optional offset from selector target

arguments.name: body
arguments.description:
Body content.
**Warning** will be rendered raw, unescaped into the DOM

attributes.name: nypr-o-article-footer
attributes.description:
Article Footer layout

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprOArticleFooter as |footer|>
  <footer.tags @tags={{array 'foo' 'bar'}} as |Tag tag|>
    <Tag @url='http://example.com/tags/{{tag}}'/>
  </footer.tags>

  <footer.contact>
    Contact us because you've got something to say
  </footer.contact>

  <footer.donate @linkText='Click' @linkUrl='https://example.com/pledge' @message='Donate because you like us'/>

  <footer.comments>
    comments go here
  </footer.comments>
</NyprOArticleFooter>
```

fields.name: inViewport
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this element is in the viewport

methods.name: _watchForTout
methods.description: Measures whether the footer is scrolled into view, and shows donate tout if so.

attributes.name: nypr-o-article-header
attributes.description: Header layout for articles. See [nypr-o-article-header](/docs/organisms/nypr-o-article-header) for usage.

attributes.name: nypr-o-block-list-group
attributes.description: Structured layout for block groups

methods.name: addColumn
methods.description: Capture how many columns are rendered

accessors.name: isSingleColumn
accessors.description: Computes if there's more than one column rendered

accessors.name: layoutClass
accessors.description: Computes the value of the layout class

arguments.name: layoutType
arguments.description: String value used to compute layout class

attributes.name: nypr-o-contact
attributes.description:
A contact tout Usage: ```hbs

hello world

 ```

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Text content

attributes.name: nypr-o-featured-block-list
attributes.description:
Block Layout
- heading area on top right
- featured block on the left
- list area on the right

arguments.name: close
arguments.description: Close button action

arguments.name: linkUrl
arguments.description: Pledge form URL

arguments.name: linkText
arguments.description: Text for Donate Link

attributes.name: nypr-o-footer
attributes.description: Site Footer

attributes.name: nypr-o-gallery-overlay
attributes.description: Gallery overlay

fields.name: slideEls
fields.description: References to slide elements. Set to an empty EmberArray the `init` hook.

fields.name: currentIndex
fields.description: Current slide's index. Updated directly by scroll handler.

methods.name: registerSlide
methods.description: Receives a new slide and adds it to the `slideEls` field

methods.name: _currentSlideWatcher
methods.description:
Handles some DOM management for scrolling events
- calls `viewedSlide` handler when a slide enters the viewport
- skips a loop if the gallery has been initialized with a slide

methods.name: _setBodyHeight
methods.description: Force the body's height to match the gallery's height. Enables consistent measurements.

accessors.name: currentSlide
accessors.description: Current slide. Derived from `currentIndex`. If there is no index yet set, it returns the first slide.

arguments.name: slideForInit
arguments.description: Scroll to the slide at the given index on initial render

arguments.name: share
arguments.description:
Parameters to pass into each slide's share tools. Should have keys for:
- facebook
- twitter
- reddit
- email

arguments.name: takeover
arguments.description: Specify whether the gallery should resize the body to to the gallery's height

arguments.name: parentRoute
arguments.description:
Parent route for "return" links
- ['<route name>', '<model or identifier>']

arguments.name: title
arguments.description: Gallery title

arguments.name: slides
arguments.description: Gallery images

arguments.name: viewedSlide
arguments.description:
Called with current slide object, DOM element, and slide index when
a slide enters the viewport

attributes.name: nypr-o-header
attributes.description:
Site header

See [usage docs](/docs/organisms/nypr-o-header) for more.

fields.name: isOpen
fields.description: Controls whether the side menu is open

fields.name: outOfViewport
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the header has been scrolled up, out of the viewport.

methods.name: toggleMenu
methods.description: Toggle open menu state and corresponding state class on body element

params.name: force
params.description: optional boolean value to set the value instead of toggling it

methods.name: focusMenu
methods.description:
Focus on the side menu
For accessibility, so screenreaders go to the menu once it is open

methods.name: _scrollListener
methods.description: Measures whether the bottom of the element is out of the viewport

accessors.name: spacerHeight
accessors.description:
Computes current vertical spacing of the header to prevent proceding elements from moving up
or down when the header is removed from/added to the document flow.

Returned as an inline CSS declaration

arguments.name: floatLandmark
arguments.description: CSS Selector to target for "out of viewport" state

attributes.name: nypr-o-related-content
attributes.description:
List of related content

Usage:
```hbs
<NyprORelatedContent @items={{items}}/>
```

arguments.name: items
arguments.description: List of items Objects with `title` and `url` keys.

attributes.name: nypr-o-sponsored-tout
attributes.description: Sponsored content tout

arguments.name: heading
arguments.description: Heading text
